data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 824 believers in Kep, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kep, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 824 believers in Kep and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 38,916 lost people in  Kep, Cambodia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kep to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Khmer Krom people.
God, we pray for the believers in Kep, Cambodia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Kep, Cambodia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kep, Cambodia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

location.name: Kep
location.people_groups_list: Chong, Deaf, Han Chinese, Teochew, Kui, Khmer
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chong (1,600), Deaf (125,000), Han Chinese, Teochew (183,000), Kui (35,000), Khmer (14,045,000)
